author: joes
msg: Allow unencoded "=" signs to occur in a (query string) param value.

author: joes
msg: Update mod_apreq filter to handle internal redirects.
Also add new tests to ensure prefetch data isn't lost across a redirect.

author: geoff
msg: Apache 1.3 servers now run in standard prefork mode under
normal operation.  single server mode (httpd -X) was replaced
with MaxClients set to 1 by default.

author: bnicholes
msg: Check to make sure that the file name is not NULL before passing it to the
strncmp() function.  At least on NetWare this prevents the strncmp() function
from faulting and also brings the code into sync with similar checks for a NULL
file name before calling strncmp() in other areas of this file.

author: grisha
msg: Got rid of tabs in docs too.
